content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position a)
- Inserter (position b) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position c) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position a

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Verify that the furnace is operational and has items to inspect before checking its inventory.
